title: Loyalty Challenge Event Details
description: Experience event field group for loyalty events to be processed by Loyalty Challenge Service.

xdm:itemList.title: Item List
xdm:itemList.description: List of items involved in the loyalty transaction.

xdm:unitPrice.title: Unit Price
xdm:unitPrice.description: The price per unit of the item.

xdm:locationId.title: Location ID
xdm:locationId.description: The identifier for the location where the loyalty transaction occurred.

xdm:transactionId.title: Transaction ID
xdm:transactionId.description: The unique identifier for the loyalty transaction.

xdm:localTimezoneOffset.title: Local Timezone Offset
xdm:localTimezoneOffset.description: The current, local time zone offset in minutes from UTC for the location of this event. This will include the current DST offset if applicable.
